title: Speaker: glass-catfish
summary: A speaker type of circuit sculpture with audio visualizing using light.

paragraph: A speaker type of circuit sculpture with audio visualizing using light.
Technically, the circuit sculpture inside works as an audio amp,
and the bottom part read the audio signals and visualize it using light panels.
A metal mirror on top is able to customize its height and tilt, and it leads to create acoustic distortion.
Like a glass catfish that shows all organs through transparent skin,
the exterior of this speaker is made of an transparent acrylic cylinder.
Also, the circuit is not a 2D layer PCB, but a three-dimensional circuit structure,
so each elctronic component looks like a life organ.
The three speakers were displayed at the exhibition, WOW-FLOW, ZER01NE DAY 2022.
